snippet: Alloy Digital and Break Media, both privately held, would focus on entertaining people ages 12 to 34.
abstract: Web video companies Alloy Digital and Break Media, both privately held, are expected to announce that they will merge; combined company will be named Defy Media and will focus on entertaining people ages 12 to 34.
lead_paragraph: Alloy Digital and Break Media, both privately held, would focus on entertaining people ages 12 to 34.

headline.main: 2 Companies in Web Video Are Expected to Merge
headline.print_headline: 2 Companies In Web Video Are Expected To Merge
